parameter.name: name
parameter.documentation: The name that defines the particular context for the subsumption based closure table.

parameter.name: concept
parameter.documentation: Concepts to add to the closure table.

parameter.name: version
parameter.documentation: A request to resync to the specified version.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: A ConceptMap with a list of new entries (code/relationship pairs) that the client should add to its closure table.
